pages.text: It is well known that every witch travels, but it is also well known that symbols that are drawn on a surface sadly do not.$(br)This is why rites can be cast $(o)remotely$(). To remotely cast a rite, a $(thing)$(t:See the according entry in the book of Witchcraft)location stone$() must be bound to a position.$(2br)To cast a rite at this position, the location stone (instead of an empty hand) must
be used to activate the golden rune of the circle used to cast the rite.$(br)It should be noted that this will increase the required power, depending on how far the selected location is.
